channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Speedrunning with Awesome GDQ
item.content:encoded: Race to the finish at breakneck speed in our Speedrunning with Awesome Games Done Quick Bundle! This amazing bundle features standout speed-running titles like the ones featured at the Games Done Quick—a semiannual charity event that celebrates the passion and community of Speed Runners. These games are perfect for savvy speed runners and those new to the hobby like Have a Nice Death, Ori and the Blind Forest, Sonic Lost World, and more. Explore the world of speed running and support the Prevent Cancer Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: New Year, New You: Communication & Meditation
item.content:encoded: As you explore new languages with Influent—and have fun in the process—with this bundle of games designed to help you learn! Embark on a mystical quest in the typing RPG adventure Nanotale: Typing Chronicles. Build vocabulary and practice pronunciation as you explore the world of Influent. Grow a world through mindfulness in PLAYNE: The Meditation Game. Plus, help support Prevent Cancer Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night: A GOG Bundle
item.content:encoded: Become one with the night—vanquish your foes silently and efficiently with this bundle of amazing stealth and action games! The Silent Night, Deadly Night Bundle features heart-pumping titles like Aragami 2; Slave Zero X; Furi; and more! Add jaw-dropping stealth action titles to your personal libraries today—and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!
